Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Replace manual forms with functional auth components on home page

- Replace non-functional manual HTML forms with actual SignupFormInline and SigninFormInline components
- Use the same API client functions \(signup/signin\) that were already tested and working
- Implement proper state management for form inputs, loading states, and error handling
- Ensure successful authentication redirects to /dashboard and stores JWT token
- Maintain the existing UI design while adding full functionality to auth forms

The home page now has fully functional signup and signin forms that connect
to the backend API, handle errors properly, show loading states, and
redirect users to the dashboard after successful authentication.
